scripts.docker:rebuild: npm run docker:rm && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.docker:rebuild:env: npm run docker:rm && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:env
scripts.docker:rebuild:localenv: npm run docker:rm && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:localenv
scripts.docker:login:hub: bash -c 'if [ -z "$DOCKER_USERNAME" ] || [ -z "$DOCKER_PASSWORD" ]; then echo "Set DOCKER_USERNAME and DOCKER_PASSWORD"; exit 1; fi; echo "$DOCKER_PASSWORD" | docker login -u "$DOCKER_USERNAME" --password-stdin'
scripts.docker:login:ghcr: bash -c 'if [ -z "$GHCR_USER" ] || [ -z "$GHCR_TOKEN" ]; then echo "Set GHCR_USER and GHCR_TOKEN"; exit 1; fi; echo "$GHCR_TOKEN" | docker login ghcr.io -u "$GHCR_USER" --password-stdin'
